name: Earthlings
description: Earthlings chronicles the day-to-day practices of the largest industries in the world
largerDescription: Using hidden cameras and never-before-seen footage, Earthlings chronicles the day-to-day practices of the largest industries in the world, all of which rely entirely on animals for profit.
